tasks.title: Bootstrap cursor-first workflow
tasks.description: Validate Taskmaster command flow in this repository.
tasks.details: Use this seed task to verify list/next/show/set-status commands.
tasks.testStrategy: Run task-master list, task-master next, task-master show 1, then set-status to done.

tasks.title: Create first feature PRD
tasks.description: Create and parse a small PRD to exercise the planning flow.
tasks.details: Create a PRD in `.taskmaster/docs/` and run `task-master parse-prd --input=<file>`.
tasks.testStrategy: Confirm tasks are generated and `task-master next` returns a workable item.
